Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Fantastic meal. The jerk chicken was cooked perfectly and so tender. The curry goat was spicy and meat was very tender. I would absolutely return to try other menu items. Well done Bammy’s

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Food is DELICIOUS! Drinks are great! Atmosphere is so cute! Loved, loved, loved going here for happy hour. …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: This place is for people who don’t like seasoning we visited here my family & I true authentic Jamaicans. We ordered curry goat & it tasted like LAMB Def a NO NO. The fish was pretty good. The chef then told us Americans do not like spicy …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Beautiful spot along the water. The staff were friendly and the drinks are good. We tried their fish, bammys, plantain, macaroni pie, curry shrimp, and conch fritters. I wouldn't do the macaroni pie again but everything else was ok. Not …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Big chunes playing in this place. Pain killers is the best drink. Conch fritters were tasty. The jerk wing sauce was on the side. I would preferred it on the wings. …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: We had the mac pie, half jerk chicken, curry goat, plantains and a few drinks. While the jerk chicken was crispy on the exterior and moist on the interior, it could have been basted with more jerk to a create a balanced flavor. The curry …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Two stars for the goat. Four stars for the jerk chicken. Goat was worst I have ever tasted. No flavor. Over cooked. Bleh! Slushy machine that makes the Pina Colada should be thoroughly cleaned. It and a nasty taste to it. Plantains and Mac and cheese were great!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: The pepper shrimp was awesome Make sure you can handle the heat though. The mac and cheese and plantains and jerk wings were also very good. If you have a opportunity sit outside for the ambiance at the water.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Been here twice & the jerk chicken meal was good. The food comes in large portions for a good price, the second time I went I had the curry goat meal, that meal was not all that I’m not sure what ingredients they use but curry is yellow not …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Great spot for Caribbean eats! I tried bammy for the first time and loved it! The conch fritters tasted like the ones I had while in the Bahamas. I will most definitely be back to enjoy more items from their menu!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: A taste of the islands away from the island. The food was wonderful. I had the pork belly, collards and plantains. The pina colada strawberry swirl was great and refreshing on a 90° day. The view is also spectacular.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Food was not good! Owner is a liar. Serving lamb and saying it’s goat. Would never come back. Also general manager with man bun is very rude . …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Listen… Bammys was so good that I didn’t get to take a picture of my food! They staff are super cool and the music definitely gives you the vibes of being in the Caribbean! To add to it, it right on the water at the Navy Yard! The food was …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: So bomb! The jerk was real good, the steamed fish was nice and spicy and just one pina colada/daiquiri blend with a float had us tipsy.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: The best Jamaican food I’ve had since living in the US. The food was amazing and the atmosphere was great!! Food portion are huge and the customer service from the staff and chief/owner was wonderful. I will be back!! Definitely recommend!!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Wow what a lovely spot right on the waterfront! We were actually originally at aqua 301 next door and noticed people weren't finishing their meals and the drinks were limited to tequila....so....we wandered over to bammy's next door since …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Excellent! Drinks were great, food was flavorful, and the staff was very friendly. I would gladly go back. I got the shrimp curry, my partner the goat curry, and rum cake.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: While I have been to small restaurants that offer their own take on Jamaican food, I was glad to have a more upscale experience at Bammy’s. I’d highly recommend the pimento fried chicken, spicy cheese, and goat curry. The drinks were also …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text:
This restaurant has such an island vibe, overlooking the Capitol Waterfront.

I didn’t get a chance to photograph The Rum Punch but it was UHHhmazinggg! It …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Bammys has a super fun, laid back atmosphere. Authentic Caribbean dishes and great late night drinks and bites. We loved the pimento cheese dip with rolls. The sauce with the fried chicken was awesome, giving 4 stars because the chicken is …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Great selection of authentic Jamaican food, especially for those homesick Yardies. The chef is from Jamaica and knows his stuff! Couldnt reccomend this place more

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Came to Bammy’s right when it opened in 2020 and was unimpressed. Since then they have seriously upped their game. Have been once for dine-in and just got takeout for restaurant week. Jerk chicken and fried chicken are on point and the Chana is great. A must visit when in navy yard.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Unfortunately, my visit to this establishment began with a bad taste in my mouth. Upon entering, there was a couple who were 30 mins late for their reservations. Due to their tardiness, their table was given to someone else. My friend …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Food was delicious and lots of options. My favorite dish was probably the Mac and cheese type dish, and the chana (chickpea dish). We ordered a lot of different sides and starters and shared as opposed to just going with three entrees. …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Ordered the roasted fish - nice flavor but obviously cooked from frozen and the fish was undercooked when it first came out. The staff was nice and the atmosphere was pleasant, but I don’t recommend the fish here. The sides they gave as an apology were tasty at least and other dishes seemed to be better received.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: This place is amazing. We ordered the Fritters, Pepper Shrimp, Mac and Cheese, Shrimp Curry and the Pork Belly. Everything was impeccable...I can't stress that enough. …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Such a fun addition to the neighborhood. Love the outdoor seating when the weather is nice. The curry dishes are amazing and the rum punch…. Chefs kiss!!!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Heard about the restaurant on Fox5DC, so we checked it out.  The view of the navy yard was a great plus and the curry goat tasted good (but the entree is a starter size) and my 10-year-old son like the macaroni pie. Nothing else was good. …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Was in town from the tri-state checking out places to eat.  My husband found Bammy's and suggested that we check it out.  Me: Do we really want to come to DC to eat more Caribbean food? But I played along.  The area was pretty nice and …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: This is my favorite Caribbean restaurant. The food is awesome. Good drinks, good music and a great vibe; excellent customer service.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: The food was delicious. Very well made and flavourful. The fish, the chicken, the goat, the drinks all tastes great.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Curry goat and escovitch were some of the best I’ve ever had! Run don’t walk to this place. Service was top-notch as well. Feels like everyone there really takes pride in serving the best Caribbean food in the city.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: This place is wonderful! Everything is flavorful and cooked to perfection. The menu is shot, simple, and delicious! Thank you Chef Chris for a thoughtful dining experience! I’ll be returning soon.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Food was amazing! Best chicken I’ve ever had. Hot sauce is top notch. Conch fritters are legit. This was the best meal I’ve had from a restaurant in a long time.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Wow - food, service and atmosphere was excellent!! Highly recommend, especially if you can grab an outdoor table overlooking the river on a nice night.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Absolutely wonderful from start to finish. Had a horrible experience at a place a few blocks away, and was so glad Bammys was on my list. Everyone was wonderful, professional, and the meal and service were top notch. I can't recommend more. …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: This place exceeded my expectations! I'm Jamaican so Caribbean food is dear to me. This restaurant really captures the essence of our cuisine. I knew this place understood Caribbean cuisine when I saw they had a chow mein on the menu. Only …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: The customer service, music, drinks (especially the pina colada), rice and peas were great! The 1/2 jerk chicken was okay, I’ll try the wings next time. The cabbage was a bit too spicy for my liking but still good.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Tucked away in Navy Yard along the Anacostia River is a Caribbean restaurant with indoor seating and a large outdoor patio near Yards Park. Here's my experience: …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Really good service, food was amazing best jerk in DC.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text:
I want to say I was very disappointed about the services my friend and I had yesterday. I order the Dinner for One
CONCH FRITTERS …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: My friends and I decided to try Bammy's and it was so much better than I initially anticipated The servers, Raz and Ashley (I hope I'm spelling both names properly) were so kind and helped us order drinks + apps/a delicious fish dish to …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Oh my gheez these people gave me curry beef and not goat. If you’re not West Indian people will feed you any and everything but overall service was stellar and drinks were A1

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: My sisters and I sat down to get a drink and we ended up staying for 4 and a half hours! The staff was unbelievably friendly and attentive. Honestly, so kind, fun, warm, and inviting. The food was to die for and the cocktails were so …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: The food was tasty, but the service was excellent. They had many table touches, and we're personable- the bartender came over and sat with us a bit before it got busy. Great atmosphere! Would have been outside if it wasn't raining so hard

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: It is amazing! The customer service is amazing and the food is even better everything on the menu is delicious especially the conc fritters and pimento fried chicken

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Tried this place yesterday and it was NOT amazing. The food was not authentic at all. Flavoring was way off on top of the fact that the spice was so strong you couldn’t enjoy the food. Cocoa bread was not the real thing at all it was just dinner rolls being passed off as cocoa bread. The were the best thing just not strong.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Nice reggea vibes everything we had was on point. Good food!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Came for impromptu drinks. The staff was so accommodating to seating us even though we didn’t have reservations. We ordered the swirl Miami Vices which were amazing. Our waitress was very attentive and personable. The owner even came over …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: First, they have been trying to do their opening during COVID-19, so hours, menu, and seating have been effected and limited due situation. With all of that in mind, our meal from Bammy's was excellent. Their Caribbean style food is a …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Great, seasoned food. Waitress was very friendly and they accommodated me without a reservation. I asked them to make my Jerk spicy and they did. Great ambiance by the water front. My only complaint is the lack of authenticity. The staff …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text:
Delivery order

Personally I wouldn’t order delivery from here again. Overly priced Jamaican …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Had the best time at Bammy's! We sat outside and ordered so much food, we were super full when we left. I highly suggest the curry, the festivales, and both the chicken and the pimento appetizers. The cocktails were amazing and the rum …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Delicious and awesome atmosphere. Our waiter was super helpful and friendly. We had the shrimp curry, goat curry, bammy, and the mac pie. Drinks were also refreshing and delicious.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: This restaurant came highly recommended from friends of ours and it did not disappoint! We really enjoyed the laid back vibe and the attentiveness of the staff. I ordered the 1/2 jerk chicken and hubby had the curry shrimp. Both dishes were …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: The food was good.. the drinks are tasty, and the service was decent. Definitely a revisit. You need to try the jerk wings and the fried conch was the best I ever tasted.. 5 stars on food, 4 on service...  drinks 10 🌟

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Damn the food is good!!!  Jerk chicken is my favorite! And Austin the ownership team is super professionals accomodating

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: My wife and loved Bammy's and will be going back. Conch fritters were amazing, probably the best I've had anywhere, and everything else was fantastic. Loved dipping the festival bread in our curry, and the bajan pepper sauce was amazing. Nice location and great service too.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text:
Great portion size, good price, poor execution.
Although it's Caribbean inspired it's definitely not Caribbean. The macaroni pie was way too spicy, to the point that I could not finish it and I actually enjoy …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: I was just there and the food is out of this world. The jerk wing will gladly fill you with jamacain love. Soo flavor. The crew and managers are so helpful. I will he back for the fish again. 👍🏽

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: No comment, you wouldn’t believe me even if I tried! I only recommend this place if you’re not really hungry, because the wait for my food was ridiculous! But it was good.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Gentrified Jamaican food. Everything was bland and was not cooked with love. The curry goat was tough and tasted like pot roast. Nothing tasted how it should've. This is definitely for white tourists who know nothing.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: save yourself the trip to the Caribbean, the food and drinks are better than anything i tried when i was down there.  Definitely recommend the rum punch and the conch fritters(I'm not even a fan of conch fritters and these were delicious)!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Had an absolutely fantastic time, ordered the shrimp curry and the fish. The drinks were strong and delicious, and the staff were super friendly, conversational and generous. definitely would come back again

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Maximum Respect To Bammy's!! If you're looking for an authentic Yard experience, this is it! Amazing food & drinks! Great atmosphere and energy! Coming here is a must. Big Up Yuh Self, Bammy! 🔥🇯🇲

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text:
Delicious, authentic and home made quality dishes in a beautiful atmosphere with water view.
Everything was amazing, fried chicken appetizer, chickpea and veggie curry were …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Had dinner on 7/25/2020. The menu had only a small number of options, including goat. I was all pumped up to try this dish because I had not had it for over 5 years. Unfortunately there was VERY LITTLE GOAT and lot of bones. The dish was …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Gerald and Chris are STILL AT IT, perfectly recreating a cuisine that we have little exposure to in DC. I grew up eating jerk chicken and curry goat and these dishes will not disappoint. Ask all the questions from the knowledgeable chefs, order all the drinks from the most-fun bartender, and get the conch fritters (you're welcome)!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Nice chill spot. Had some wings and a few beers.  The pork belly is must and Staff was very nice.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Grabbed take-out and took it home (roughly 25 minutes) -- the food was fantastic. We ordered the chicken, two curries, and a handful of the sides. Very excited for our next visit - there was a great vibe when we picked up with the outdoor table set up and alcohol slushy drinks.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Wish I had taken pics of meal. This place was delicious! Go for the "meal for one" chicken...it feeds 2. Small menu done well! Great service too!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: They were super slammed on Saturday night and still took great care of us. The manager was a class act, our server was a class act, the host / busser was a class act, food was amazing location was untouchable

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: We’ve lived in navy yard for the past five years, and are glad to see a restaurant like Bammys come into the neighborhood.  We tried several items on the menu, and really enjoyed it.  The rice and beans weren’t as flavorful as we would’ve …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text:
BAMmys felt like an island resort moments away from your back yard.
Outdoors on the water, carribean music and great vibes. The food, was 5 stars. …

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: The service was great. Food was amazing! Drinks were good also😊

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Overall pretty good Jamaican food!! If you are in the area check it out!!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Awesome new spot with a great view of the water. Great place if your with family or friends that like to share and pass around plates. Make sure you order all the condiments! Rarely do I order the same drink twice, but I did so here and drank their Pain Killer all night. Thank you Ally, Allysea, and Chris for taking care of us!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Food was amazing and great service to top it off! I will definitely be going back soon.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: SOOOOO great!! I only went there for drinks and they were AMAZING!! Definitely go for the Sangria it's phenomenal.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Incredible food at a great price. We ordered all of the side items and were blown away! Cant wait to keep trying their menu. Incredible chefs, great and friendly wait staff, and very COVID friendly.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Delicious greens and curry! Nice and moderately spicy, the perfect pairing for a cold beer on a warm summer night. The riverside setting is spectacular, too.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Absolutely incredible food. All of the dishes are packed with flavor and just the right amount of heat. We got the family meal, and it is perfect for sharing - couldn’t recommend enough!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Okay,  not what I was expecting for me being from Jamaica but it was okay. Cute spot on the water for you to hang out with your friends. Not really a place for a date.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Brought my Jamaican dad. Loved the conch fritters. Downed them with Red Stripe. Will be coming back.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text:
Very good jerk fried chicken.
Drinks were also pretty good. Got the coloring book, rum punch, and mix up. Mix up is a little sweet tho

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: VERY poor and slow service. Sat for 20 minutes with no waiter. Food was slow, took 25 minutes to get wings. The wings were good, but that was the only good thing about my visit.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Authentic food. Flavorful, fresh great service. The beer was ice cold. Jessica was a wonderful server and everyone was very accomidating.  Just bring in plantains.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Delicious food made better by an awesome atmosphere. I literally couldn’t pick a favorite if I had to after eating here 3 times. Get there now! You won’t regret!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Great Pina Coladas to go but the god is okay for Caribbean food. Goat was very spicy and the menu is a little limited.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Food is wonderful. They have a lovely set up for outdoor dining waterfront. Good reggae music too. Staff is friendly and knowledgeable.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: The location, music, and outdoor bar was an amazing experience! Staff was extremely helpful and friendly. But the food was out of this world amazing!!!! Definitely coming back for seconds and thirds.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: We had Valentine’s Day brunch here and everything was so good. Prices are very reasonable and everything we had was delicious. Highly recommend!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Bammy’s is everything. The staff are kind, friendly, and accommodating. The tropical sangria is a perfectly balanced refreshing drink. I would highly recommend them!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Great vibes, drink, and food. Respect. Chris we will be back.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Great Caribbean inspired food, I like the ambiance and the drinks.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: This was an effort at trying to create the real authentic carribean food....Ain’t nothing like the real thing baby! It’s okay for me. Drinks are done great!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Drinks are strong, and taste like it. Don't expect craft cocktails, but they get the job done. Food is ok.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Was Yummy, really enjoyed the jerk pork belly and the fried pimento chicken. Owner Chris was nice.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Very good food. Good customer service

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Food is amazing, drinks are top notch and the service was just as great. Can't wait to come again.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Covid sensitive.  Fantastic, friendly staff.  Great food.  Great location and view.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Good but expensive escovitch fish. It's large enough to feed 2 people.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Food was not authentic Jamaican food... tasted very American and not in a good way.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Been 3x since they opened, tried it all! Amazing food, better staff!! New go to spot. Highly recommend them!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Yummy. Nice flavors and excellent cocktails. Will return

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Great service and unique Caribbean food selections

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Excellent food. Ordering and picking up was a breeze. I'll be back.

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Great place, food , service, location.  Sits in the water and has great eats.  Check it out!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: This place was way cool!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: the whole fried fish was amazing!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Our favorite restaurant in DC!!!

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Great vibes and delicious food. Chill place to spend a weekend afternoon

Name: Bammy's Wok
Review Text: Fantastic food, great location, good service!!
